languages.text: "Первичный осмотр судна указывает, что мои собратья-Эксплораторы уже провели здесь процедуру упокоения. Дальнейшее изучение нецелесообразно".
"An initial survey of the vessel indicates that my Explorator brethren have already performed a requiem rite here. Further examination is inadvisable."
languages.original_text: "Первичный осмотр судна указывает, что мои собратья-Эксплораторы уже провели здесь процедуру упокоения. Дальнейшее изучение нецелесообразно".

traits.locale_text: "An initial survey of the vessel indicates that my Explorator brethren have already performed a requiem rite here. Further examination is inadvisable."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “对这艘飞船的初步检查表明，我的开拓者兄弟们已经在这里举行了安魂仪式。不建议进行进一步的检查。”
languages.original_text: "An initial survey of the vessel indicates that my Explorator brethren have already performed a requiem rite here. Further examination is inadvisable."

traits.locale_text: “对这艘飞船的初步检查表明，我的开拓者兄弟们已经在这里举行了安魂仪式。不建议进行进一步的检查。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Una exploración inicial de la nave indica que mis hermanos explorator ya han realizado un rito de réquiem aquí. No es recomendable indagar más».
languages.original_text: "An initial survey of the vessel indicates that my Explorator brethren have already performed a requiem rite here. Further examination is inadvisable."

traits.locale_text: «Una exploración inicial de la nave indica que mis hermanos explorator ya han realizado un rito de réquiem aquí. No es recomendable indagar más».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「船内の初期調査によれば、我が探査部隊の同胞がここですでに鎮魂の儀を執り行ったようです。これ以上の調査は危険でしょう」
languages.original_text: "An initial survey of the vessel indicates that my Explorator brethren have already performed a requiem rite here. Further examination is inadvisable."

traits.locale_text: 「船内の初期調査によれば、我が探査部隊の同胞がここですでに鎮魂の儀を執り行ったようです。これ以上の調査は危険でしょう」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Eine erste Untersuchung des Schiffs weist darauf hin, dass meine Exploratorbrüder hier bereits ein Requiem gefeiert haben. Von weiteren Untersuchungen ist abzuraten."
languages.original_text: "An initial survey of the vessel indicates that my Explorator brethren have already performed a requiem rite here. Further examination is inadvisable."

traits.locale_text: "Eine erste Untersuchung des Schiffs weist darauf hin, dass meine Exploratorbrüder hier bereits ein Requiem gefeiert haben. Von weiteren Untersuchungen ist abzuraten."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Le sondage initial du vaisseau indique que mes camarades explorators ont déjà accompli un rituel de requiem ici. Je déconseille fortement de poursuivre l'examen. »
languages.original_text: "An initial survey of the vessel indicates that my Explorator brethren have already performed a requiem rite here. Further examination is inadvisable."

traits.locale_text: « Le sondage initial du vaisseau indique que mes camarades explorateurs ont déjà accompli un rituel de requiem ici. Je déconseille fortement de poursuivre l'examen. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Araca dair yapılan ilk incelemeler, Keşiftör kardeşlerimin burada bir ağıt ayini gerçekleştirdiğine işaret ediyor. Araştırmayı derinleştirmemeyi tavsiye ederim."
languages.original_text: "An initial survey of the vessel indicates that my Explorator brethren have already performed a requiem rite here. Further examination is inadvisable."
